author: sky.cactus
content: Need other editors to chime in on https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2228, specifically whether we want the can of worms that is trademarking in EIPs or not.

author: sky.cactus
content: In previous reviews I asked the author to remove the Trademark section to avoid that can of worms but they are pretty set on getting it added.  I still advocate against including legal stuff beyond the CC0 copyright in the EIPs repository, but as usual I'll defer to the EIP Editors group as a whole on this.

author: gcolvin
content: <@!301186049323958275>  I should think it's up to the Foundation itself to enforce their trademarks as they see fit.
